quotes.quote: Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible.
Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
Seeing much, suffering much, and studying much are the three pillars of learning.
I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations, and you are not in this world to live up to mine.
When your temper rises, lower your fists. When your fists rise, lower your temper.
A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
My computer beat me at checkers, but I sure beat it at kickboxing.
If it doesn't challenge you, it doesn't change you.
Anything that gets your blood racing is probably worth doing.
There's no need to fear the wind if your haystacks are tied down.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.
It is easy to stand in the crowd, but it takes courage to stand alone.
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
Real strength is not just a condition of one's muscle, but a tenderness in one's spirit.
You can only fight the way you practice.
Your spirit is the true shield.
It isn't the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe.
Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
Fire tests gold, suffering tests brave men.
Life doesn't get easier, or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.
Cowards never start. The weak never finish. Winners never quit.
Never let your fear decide your future.
True strength is in the soul and spirit, not in the muscles.
The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
It's not just self defence, it's about self control, body discipline, and mind discipline and breath techniques. It involves yoga. It involves meditation. It's an art, not a sport.
The kickboxing and the martial arts is so fun. It's like anything in school. You're not going to retain information unless you're interested in it.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
Kickboxing tightens you up.
A black belt is nothing more than a belt that goes around your waist. Being a black belt is a state of mind and attitude.
